transform.expr: isValid(datum["Body Mass (g)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Body Mass (g)"]) && isValid(datum["Beak Length (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Beak Length (mm)"])
isValid(datum["Flipper Length (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Flipper Length (mm)"]) && isValid(datum["Beak Length (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Beak Length (mm)"])
isValid(datum["Beak Depth (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Beak Depth (mm)"]) && isValid(datum["Beak Length (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Beak Length (mm)"])
isValid(datum["Body Mass (g)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Body Mass (g)"]) && isValid(datum["Beak Depth (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Beak Depth (mm)"])
isValid(datum["Flipper Length (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Flipper Length (mm)"]) && isValid(datum["Beak Depth (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Beak Depth (mm)"])
isValid(datum["Body Mass (g)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Body Mass (g)"]) && isValid(datum["Flipper Length (mm)"]) && isFinite(+datum["Flipper Length (mm)"])

description.signal: "Body Mass (g): " + (format(datum["Body Mass (g)"], "")) + "; Beak Length (mm): " + (format(datum["Beak Length (mm)"], "")) + "; Species: " + (isValid(datum["Species"]) ? datum["Species"] : ""+datum["Species"])

"Flipper Length (mm): " + (format(datum["Flipper Length (mm)"], "")) + "; Beak Length (mm): " + (format(datum["Beak Length (mm)"], "")) + "; Species: " + (isValid(datum["Species"]) ? datum["Species"] : ""+datum["Species"])

"Beak Depth (mm): " + (format(datum["Beak Depth (mm)"], "")) + "; Beak Length (mm): " + (format(datum["Beak Length (mm)"], "")) + "; Species: " + (isValid(datum["Species"]) ? datum["Species"] : ""+datum["Species"])
